definition: constituting or existing only in the form of an idea or mental image or conception, the idea of something that is perfect
details:
adjective
- constituting or existing only in the form of an idea or mental image or conception
= example: constituting or existing only in the form of an idea or mental image or conception
- conforming to an ultimate standard of perfection or excellence
= example: conforming to an ultimate standard of perfection or excellence
- of or relating to the philosophical doctrine of the reality of ideas

noun
- the idea of something that is perfect
- model of excellence or perfection of a kind
= synonyms: apotheosis
